albums.title: Please Stop By For Christmas
albums.credits:
The Invisible Sundial Christmas EP, 'Please Stop By For Christmas', contains two original songs and one traditional.
The first song, 'Please Stop By For Christmas', is about hoping for a loved one to be around for the holiday.
The next song, 'Christmas Eve 2049', is a futuristic take on Christmas, drawing inspiration from science fiction soundtracks.
Finally, 'Good King Wenceslas' is a reinterpretation of the classic song featuring a speech synthesizer choir. I hope you and your loved ones enjoy!
All songs performed by Austin Amberg.
Good King Wenceslas written by John Mason Neale and Thomas Helmore. Other songs written by Austin Amberg.
Art by Taras Tymoshenko.
